characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the beginning of your Movement phase, if this model is not within 1" of an enemy model it can leap back into the skies. Remove this model from the battlefield. It can return to the battlefield as described in the Children of Baharroth ability. This model may not both Skyleap and descend on Swooping Hawk wings in the same turn. If the battle ends while this model is in the skies, they are considered to be slain.
